meanings: [명사] boast, [동사] boast (about/of/that), brag (about/that), show off, be boastful

vlive.korean: 한번 보여주셔야죠 끝에 그린 거 자랑... Show us what you drew... 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
"아리 자랑 좀 해주세요" - 아리요? "Please show off Ari". - Ari? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
이거 눈 자랑도 아까 방금 했... I showed off my eye makeup earlier. 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅁㅁㄹ🧸
vlive.english: I showed off my eye makeup earlier.

vlive.korean: [형아 자랑] '쇼! 챔피언'에서 1등 한 거 모르세요? 아이돌 중에서? [Bragging about SOOBIN] won first place among idol singers on "Show Champion?" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Bragging about SOOBIN] won first place among idol singers on "Show Champion?"

vlive.korean: 자랑 중이야, 지금! I'm showing off. 듣기 View video TWICE : 쯔묶+앞머리👱‍♀️🧒

examples.korean: She was proud of her long pedigree. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신의 오래된 가문을 자랑스러워했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was proud of her long pedigree. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car had been his proudest possession. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 차는 그의 가장 자랑스러운 재산이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car had been his proudest possession. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He bragged to his friends about the crime. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그가 저지른 범죄에 대하여 친구들에게 자랑했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He bragged to his friends about the crime. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sam boasted that she could beat anyone at poker. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 샘은 포커에서는 누구든 이길 수 있다고 자랑했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sam boasted that she could beat anyone at poker. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He prides himself on the longevity of the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그 회사에서 오래된[오래 근무한] 것을 자랑스러워한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He prides himself on the longevity of the company. Add to Wordbook
